body_html:
@oscarriddle,

Unfortunately, saved_model is not frozen. freeze_graph.py convert variables to constants and removes training nodes that are not used in inference as well as may apply a couple of optimizations. graph_def from saved model still contains training nodes and variables. If you want to call TRT optimization on saved_model, graphdef you need to first freeze it. You can call freeze_graph() in your script. Check freeze_graph.py.

Cheers,
